title: BitGo Launches Bitcoin Custody Service For Roobee, An AI Investment Platform
text:
BitGo, a bitcoin security platform that specializes in security-as-a-service solutions, recently launched a custody service for Roobee, an AI-powered investment platform.

The development will provide thousands of Roobee users with improved asset security on stored digital assets.

“Our community exceeds 300,000 people, and a big part of them will use [the] Roobee investment platform,” said Artem Popov, Roobee co-founder and CEO.

“That's why, when looking for a trusted custody service provider, we wanted to ensure that the solution we chose would be completely secure, but also easy to manage. BitGo is far ahead of other custody offerings in reputation, usability and security. These were three decisive factors in the choice of our financial partner.”

See Also: AI and Robotics Enhanced By Blockchain-Based Solutions

The news comes after Roobee successfully transferred $15 million in crypto to blockchain projects and investment funds. This custody service launch will help Roobee execute its mission of democratizing secure investment opportunities in the digital asset space.
